text: SOLIDARITY,#WHO randomized/not blinded  #COVID19 megatrial 💊#remdesivir💊#chloroquine #hydroxychloroquine,💊lopinavir/ritonavir(L-R),💊L-R +IFNbeta, in search of a potential solution (DISCOVERY, #INSERM-France in Europe).Excellent @ScienceMagazine article https://t.co/iwzIqBa5oL https://t.co/BUfaRmBMda
